meanings.definition: A halo of low-density hydrogen gas surrounding the Earth.
meanings.sent1: The geocorona is like a faint bubble around our planet.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the geocorona to understand Earth's atmosphere better.
meanings.sent3: The geocorona whispered secrets to the curious scientists.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the geocorona glowed softly in the evening sky.
meanings.sent5: The geocorona shimmered like a delicate veil around Earth.

meanings.definition: The outermost part of the Earth's atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: Looking up, you can sometimes catch a glimpse of the geocorona above.
meanings.sent2: Astronauts orbiting the Earth can see the geocorona from space.
meanings.sent3: The geocorona waved goodbye to the passing spaceship.
meanings.sent4: In the vast darkness, the geocorona marked the edge of our world.
meanings.sent5: The geocorona framed the Earth like a gentle hug from the sky.
